title: PLEASE HELP
body: Hello guys I need your help please i keep trying to get into a game but when I get to the loading screen it crashes and the game kicks me out by saying you have disconnected even though my net is pretty good I tried closing my firewall and third party firewalls but still it did not make any diffrence.Please i beg you for some advice on you to get this thing solved.Thank you.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: This could also be related to some network settings, so do me a favor and check off the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well as some basic troubleshooting. If that doesn't fix things, we can dive a bit deeper!
